page_content:
40  |  Technology and InnovationPresented Tech Projects
to Local Students
In collaboration with several local schools, 
ArcBest Technologies virtually presented 
showcases on technology projects and 
processes to increase students’ awareness of 
STEM careers and opportunities. From November 
2021 to January 2022, ArcBest Technologies 
team members presented at six schools, 
covering topics like machine learning and app 
development. The team plans to continue hosting 
these project showcases throughout 2022, 
reaching out to smaller, rural schools in the Fort 
Smith, Arkansas, area.
